data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: As we can see from the picture, there is an African woman around thirty years old. She is wearing a green turban, and it is quite stylish. Wearing turbans is common among Sikhs, including women. The headgear also serves as a religious observance, including among Shia Muslims. The turban is the traditional headdress of Sufi scholars. Additionally, turbans have often been worn by nobility, regardless of religious background. They are also sometimes donned to protect hair or as a headwrap for women following cancer treatments. She is wearing a leopard-print suit. As we can see from the picture, she is focusing on making handiwork. She holds a yellow pen in her right hand and a green pen in her left hand. There is a weaving machine in front of her, and probably she is weaving the turban. She looks experienced, and She might do this as a living for more than ten years. This is the fun part of weaving, and with all the beauty and creativity, she can make beautiful cloth and turban. （175 字）
